name: Tile (itch) (GoeDev)
description:
Draw the rug, carpet, postcard patterns in the least moves. The levels are generated randomly; your movements and playing time will affect your score.

The idea was inspired by a simple BASIC code. I was planning to use this code to generate random postcard images. Then I decided to gamified the idea.

The game is also including a free mode to draw whatever you want. So you can export your patterns as an image.
